description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Imagine you were hopelessly lost in an abandoned mine, struggling to survive.  By the faint light of your lamp you peer into the darkness.  You have the sinking feeling that someone, or something is watching your every move...
